summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2631 for the improvement of Corson Avenue from Warsaw Street to Willow Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 30869, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
